overview: Adwin ,a painter and father, his two mischievous  children, Apollo and Edith , and the safety of the familyâ€™s home are targeted by a murdering house intruder disguised in a horse mask. As Adwin continues to endure the threatening presence of the Horseman and the vibrant yet horrific atmosphere of his current surroundings, he slowly begins to regain awareness and take grasp of reality.
tagline: The house of a painter and his two children is broken into by a blood thisty and masked intruder.
title: Manhorse
